tool_description: Matches invoice line items and amounts against corresponding purchase orders to verify authorization and detect discrepancies in quantities and pricing.

po_number.description: Purchase order number if referenced on invoice

invoice_total.description: Total invoice amount to match against PO

invoice_date.description: Invoice date for PO validity checking

error_messages: Purchase order not found: No matching PO found for provided criteria. Verify PO number or create non-PO invoice workflow.
PO expired: Purchase order has expired or is outside valid date range. Check PO validity period.
Amount exceeds PO: Invoice amount exceeds remaining PO balance. Verify quantities and pricing or request PO amendment.
Vendor mismatch: Invoice vendor does not match PO vendor. Verify vendor information accuracy.
Invalid date format: Invoice date must be in ISO 8601 format. Provide date as YYYY-MM-DD.
usage: Provide invoice number, vendor name, total amount, and date. Include PO number if available. Returns matching analysis and any discrepancies found.

po_match_found.description: Whether matching purchase order was found

matched_po_number.description: Purchase order number that was matched

amount_variance.description: Difference between invoice and PO amounts

match_status.description: Overall matching status (exact_match, within_tolerance, discrepancy, no_match)

discrepancy_details.description: List of discrepancies found during matching
